publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3565 Jackie Baillie: Perfect Pupils—That the Parliament congratulates Ashley-Leigh Robertson and Rasiba Norin, the two Dumbarton Academy pupils who attained 100% in their higher modern studies papers; acknowledges that they are the first two pupils from the same school ever to achieve such a feat; recognises the hard work of both girls who gained a further four highers each; further recognises that this achievement is a positive reflection on the teaching staff at Dumbarton Academy and the area as a whole, and wishes both girls long and successful careers.

S3M-3565 Jackie Baillie: Perfect Pupils—That the Parliament congratulates Ashley-Leigh Robertson and Rasiba Norin, the two Dumbarton Academy pupils who attained 100% in their higher modern studies papers; acknowledges that they are the first two pupils from the same school ever to achieve such a feat; recognises the hard work of both girls who gained a further four highers each; further recognises that this achievement is a positive reflection on the teaching staff at Dumbarton Academy and the area as a whole, and wishes both girls long and successful careers.
S3M-3565 Perfect Pupils (lodged on 26 February 2009) Ken Macintosh*, David Whitton*, Jamie McGrigor*, Ross Finnie*, Robin Harper*
S3M-3565 Perfect Pupils (lodged on 26 February 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3565 Perfect Pupils (lodged on 26 February 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*, David Stewart*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-3565 Perfect Pupils (lodged on 26 February 2009) Karen Whitefield*
